Key Match Events: Francisco Alvarez hit a home run in the 2nd inning.
Starling Marte scored a run in the 7th inning.
Eduardo Escobar doubled in two runs in the 7th inning.
Bryson Stott grounded into a fielder's choice, scoring Realmuto in the 8th inning.
Pete Alonso singled in Eduardo Escobar in the 8th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Citi Field in Queens, New York.
